TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 LINQ to SQL 架構的主要進入點。

span.span: Represents the main entry point for the LINQ to SQL framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是透過資料庫連接對應的所有實體的來源。The is the source of all entities mapped over a database connection. 它會追蹤您對擷取的所有實體的變更，並維護 」 識別快取 」 的實體會擷取超過一次的保證都由使用相同的物件執行個體。It tracks changes that you made to all retrieved entities and maintains an "identity cache" that guarantees that entities retrieved more than one time are represented by using the same object instance. 一般情況下，執行個體為了最後一個 「 工作單元 」 不過您的應用程式定義的詞彙。In general, a instance is designed to last for one "unit of work" however your application defines that term. A精簡，不是建立高成本。A is lightweight and is not expensive to create. 一般[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]應用程式會建立在方法範圍內或存留較短的類別，代表一組邏輯的成員身分的執行個體相關的資料庫作業。A typical [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] application creates instances at method scope or as a member of short-lived classes that represent a logical set of related database operations.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 您使用的連接字串可以是 ADO.NET 連接字串。

span.span: The connection string you use can be an ADO.NET connection string.

summary.span: 您也可以指定 SQL Server Express 或 SQL Server Compact 檔案的檔名。

span.span: You can also specify a filename to a SQL Server Express or SQL Server Compact file.

summary.span: 參考 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort] (~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 所使用的連線，以初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by referencing the connection used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks A開啟和關閉資料庫連接，視您關閉的連接或連接字串提供。A opens and closes a database connection as needed if you provide a closed connection or a connection string. 一般情況下，您應該永遠不需要呼叫`Dispose`上。In general, you should never have to call `Dispose` on a . 如果您提供的開啟連接，就不會關閉它。If you provide an open connection, the will not close it. 因此，請勿執行個體化與開啟的連接除非您有很好的理由，若要這樣做。Therefore, do not instantiate a with an open connection unless you have a good reason to do this. 在交易，無法開啟或關閉的連線，以避免升級。In a transaction, a will not open or close a connection to avoid promotion.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值會增加查詢的逾時期間，否則查詢會在預設逾時期間內逾時。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that increases the time-out period for queries that would otherwise time out during the default time-out period.

value.span: 整數值，該值會增加查詢的逾時期間，否則查詢會在預設逾時期間內逾時。

span.span: An integer value that increases the time-out period for queries that would otherwise time out during the default time-out period.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會取得或設定用來執行產生的命令的命令逾時 (`IDbCommands`)。This property gets or sets the command time-out used to execute generated commands (`IDbCommands`). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . 當這個屬性未設定，預設值的用於執行查詢命令。When this property is not set, the default value of is used for query command execution. 此預設值是由設定存放裝置提供者。This default value is set by the storage provider. 請注意，某些提供者可能會擲回例外狀況是否此值設定為非零值。Note that some providers may throw exceptions if this value is set to a non-zero value.

summary.span: 在伺服器上建立資料庫。

span.span: Creates a database on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用下列演算法來衍生此名稱的資料庫：The name of the database is derived by using the following algorithm: 1. 如果資料庫的連接字串中，使用該名稱。If a database is identified in the connection string, its name is used. 1. 如果屬性已存在，其屬性用做為資料庫的名稱。If a attribute is present, its property is used as the name of the database. 1. 如果沒有在連接字串和強型別沒有資料庫標記使用時，具有相同名稱的資料庫繼承類別建立。If there is no database tag in the connection string and a strongly typed is used, a database that has the same name as the inheriting class is created. 1. 如果弱型別是使用，擲回例外狀況。If a weakly typed is used, an exception is thrown. 1. 如果已建立藉由使用檔案名稱，建立對應到該檔案名稱的資料庫。If the has been created by using a file name, the database corresponding to that file name is created. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何設定暫存資料庫並加以移除。The following code shows how to set up a temporary database and then remove it. [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/vb/Module1.vb#1)]

[!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/cs/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.DataContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Data.Linq.DataContext/vb/Module1.vb#1)]

.property instance bool DeferredLoadingEnabled
Public Property DeferredLoadingEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool DeferredLoadingEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否要延遲載入一對多或一對一關聯性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to delay-load one-to-many or one-to-one relationships.

value.span: 如果啟用延後載入則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if deferred loading is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當程式碼會存取其中一個這些關聯性，null 而且會傳回的關聯性是一對一時，如果它是一對多，會傳回空集合。When the code accesses one of these relationships, null is returned if the relationship is one-to-one, and an empty collection is returned if it is one-to-many. 關聯性仍然可以藉由設定填入屬性。The relationships can still be filled by setting the property. 這個屬性的主要案例是要讓您擷取的物件模型，並將它送出 （例如，至 Web 服務）。The main scenario for this property is to enable you to extract a piece of the object model and send it out (for example, to a Web service). > [!NOTE] > 如果這個屬性設定為`false`執行查詢之後，會擲回例外狀況。If this property is set to `false` after a query has been executed, an exception is thrown. 請參閱**有效模式**下面章節，如需詳細資訊。See the **Valid Modes** section below for more information. ## 有效的模式Valid modes 延後的載入需要物件追蹤。Deferred loading requires object tracking. 只有下列三種模式是有效的：Only the following three modes are valid: - = `false`. = `false`. 已忽略，並且會推斷`false`。 is ignored and inferred to be `false`. 這個行為會對應至唯讀。This behavior corresponds to a read-only . - = `true`. = `true`. = `false`. = `false`. 這種情況下會對應至可讓使用者在使用載入物件圖形指示詞，但它不會啟用延後的載入。This situation corresponds to a that allows users to load an object graph by using directives, but it does not enable deferred loading. - 都設為`true`。Both are set to `true`. 這是預設值。This is the default. 在執行查詢之後，可能不會變更旗標。The flags may not be changed after a query has been executed. 會使用該第一個查詢執行之後的任何變更擲回例外狀況。Any change after the execution of the first query that uses that throws an exception.

span.span: Note the following behavior: If the number of objects in the array is less than the highest number identified in the command string, an exception is thrown.

param.span: 如果陣列包含命令字串中未參考的物件，則不會擲回任何例外狀況。

span.span: If the array contains objects that are not referenced in the command string, no exception is thrown.

param.span: 如果有任一參數為 null，則會轉換成 。

summary.span: 直接在資料庫上執行 SQL 命令。

span.span: Executes SQL commands directly on the database.

returns.span: 已執行的命令所修改的資料列數。

span.span: The number of rows modified by the executed command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是案例的傳遞機制其中[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]可以充分地提供特定的案例。This method is a pass-through mechanism for cases where [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] does not adequately provide for a particular scenario. 此命令的語法是幾乎完全相同的語法，用於建立 ADO.NET `DataCommand`。The syntax for the command is almost the same as the syntax used to create an ADO.NET `DataCommand`. 唯一的差別是中所指定參數。The only difference is in how the parameters are specified. 具體來說，只要它們在大括號 （{...}） 指定的參數，並加以列舉從 0 開始。Specifically, you specify parameters by enclosing them in braces ({…}) and enumerate them starting from 0. 參數陣列中編號相等的物件相關聯的參數。The parameter is associated with the equally numbered object in the parameters array. `ExecuteQuery` 和`ExecuteCommand`讓您指定的變數的參數替代的引數數目。`ExecuteQuery` and `ExecuteCommand` allow you to specify a variable number of arguments for parameter substitution. 例如，您可以指定參數叫用 ExecuteQuery 時\:For example, you can specify the parameters when invoking ExecuteQuery\: ``` db.ExecuteQuery("select * from dbo.Customers where City = {0}", "London"); ``` 此外，另一個範例：And, another example: ``` db.ExecuteCommand("UPDATE Products SET QuantityPerUnit = {0} WHERE ProductID = {1}", "24 boxes", 5); ``` 下列範例會開啟連接並通過 SQL`UPDATE`命令至 SQL 引擎。The following example opens a connection and passes a SQL `UPDATE` command to the SQL engine. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqCommunicatingWithDatabase/vb/Module1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 在插入覆寫方法內執行，以將插入作業所需的動態 SQL 產生與執行工作重新委派給 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq] (~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]。

span.span: Executes, inside insert override methods, to redelegate to [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] the task of generating and executing dynamic SQL for insert operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意下列考量：Note the following considerations: - 方法具有受保護的修飾詞，因為它使用需要子類別化。Because the method has a protected modifier, its use requires subclassing . - 如果這項作業不會在內部呼叫，會擲回例外狀況作業。An exception is thrown if this operation is not called inside a operation. 它不是當做獨立作業的範圍外呼叫作業。It is not intended to be called as a stand-alone operation outside the scope of a operation. 本身呼叫覆寫的方法如果它們實作，而且先前的方法要覆寫方法內呼叫。 itself calls override methods if they are implemented and the previous methods are intended to be called inside the override methods. - 它會傳遞正確的實體中，開發人員的責任。It is the responsibility of the developer to pass in the correct entity. 實作會驗證傳入的實體會追蹤。The implementation verifies that the passed-in entity is tracked. 不過，負責維護訊息順序，或將兩次傳遞相同的實體，開發人員。However, it is the responsibility of the developer to maintain the order or pass in the same entity two times. - 它是叫用正確的動態 API，開發人員的責任。It is the responsibility of the developer to invoke the correct dynamic API. 例如，在`Update`覆寫方法，只有可以呼叫方法。For example, in the `Update` override method, only the method can be called. [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 並不會偵測或驗證所叫用的動態方法是否符合適用的作業。 does not detect or verify whether the invoked dynamic method matches the applicable operation. 如果不適用的方法呼叫結果便未定義 (例如，呼叫更新物件)。The results are undefined if an inapplicable method is called (for example, calling for an object to be updated).

summary.span: 直接在資料庫上執行 SQL 查詢，並傳回物件。

span.span: Executes SQL queries directly on the database and returns objects.

returns.span: 查詢所傳回物件的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects returned by the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是案例的傳遞機制其中[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]不會提供在特定案例。This method is a pass-through mechanism for cases where [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] does not provide for a particular scenario. 欄位的查詢結果中的相符資料行和內容物件中的演算法的運作方式，如下所示：The algorithm for matching columns in the result of the query to fields and properties in the object works as follows: - 如果欄位或屬性已對應至特定資料行名稱，結果集 (Resultset) 必須包含該資料行名稱。If a field or property is mapped to a particular column name, that column name is expected in the resultset. - 如果欄位或屬性未對應，結果集必須包含與該欄位或屬性同名的資料行。If a field or property is not mapped, a column with the same name as the field or property is expected in the resultset. - 執行比較區分大小寫比對的第一次尋找。The comparison is performed by first looking for a case-sensitive match. 如果找不到這類相符項目，不區分大小寫的相符項目就會繼續搜尋。If such a match is not found, a subsequent search occurs for a case-insensitive match. - 此查詢必須傳回所有追蹤的欄位和屬性 （除了那些可能有所延後載入） 的物件在下列所有條件都為真：The query must return all the tracked fields and properties of the object (apart from those subject to deferred loading) when all the following are true: - 如果``實體明確地追蹤。If `` is an entity explicitly tracked by the . - ObjectTrackingEnabled 為 true。ObjectTrackingEnabled is true. - 這個實體具有主索引鍵。The entity has a primary key. 否則，會擲回例外狀況。Otherwise an exception is thrown. - 在其他情況下，查詢可以擷取只追蹤的欄位和物件的屬性的子集。In all other cases, the query can retrieve just a subset of the tracked fields and properties for the object. 下列 C# 程式碼片段示範這個方法的用法之一：The following C# snippet shows one use for this method: ``` var customers = db.ExecuteQuery(@"SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName, ContactName, ContactTitle, Address, City, Region, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Fax FROM dbo.Customers WHERE City = {0}", "London"); foreach (Customer c in customers) Console.WriteLine(c.ContactName); ``` 在 Visual Basic 中In Visual Basic ``` Dim customers = db.ExecuteQuery(Of Customer)("SELECT CustomerID, _ CompanyName, ContactName, ContactTitle, _ Address, City, Region, PostalCode, Country, Phone, Fax _ FROM dbo.Customers _ WHERE City = {0}", "London") For Each c As Customer In customers Console.WriteLine(c.ContactName) Next ```

summary.span: 取得 所追蹤的已修改物件。

span.span: Gets the modified objects tracked by .

returns.span: 這組物件是以三個唯讀集合傳回。

span.span: The set of objects is returned as three read-only collections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請注意下列考量：Note the following considerations: - 可能有副作用，例如推斷的插入和刪除作業，通常就會執行時的。 might have side effects, such as inference of insert and delete operations that are usually performed at the time of . 比方說，下列作業中所使用的物件可以建立下列清單中的對應推斷的作業：For example, objects that are used in the following operations can create corresponding inferred operations in the following list: - 若要。 to . - 將 null 指派 (可能是因為的至。 assignment to null (possibly because of to . - 根據外部索引鍵條件約束時，可能無法排序集合。The set may not be ordered according to foreign key constraints. - 無法使用資料庫產生的值 （例如，主要和外部索引鍵值、 時間戳記，等等）。Database-generated values (for example, primary and foreign key values, timestamps, and so forth) are not available. 這類資訊需要執行資料庫命令，以及也許擷取的資訊 （例如，外部索引鍵從主索引鍵） 的傳播。Such information requires database command execution and perhaps the propagation of retrieved information (for example, foreign key from primary key). - 在呼叫時計算一組已變更的物件。The set of changed objects is computed at the time of the call. 後續呼叫可以產生一組不同，如果進行其他變更。Subsequent calls to can produce a different set if additional changes are made. 在不進行任何變更時的輸出會出現，如下所示：Output when no changes have been made appears as follows: `{Added: 0, Removed: 0, Modified: 0}` ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqDebuggingSupport#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/cs/Program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DLinqDebuggingSupport#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/vb/Module1.vb#2)]

param.name: query
param.span: 會擷取內含 SQL 命令資訊的查詢。

summary.span: 取得由 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq] (~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 產生之 SQL 命令的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets the information about SQL commands generated by [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)].
The requested command information object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只 getter 並不會影響狀態。This method is only a getter and does not affect state. 請注意下列考量：Note the following considerations: - 引數必須為非 null。The argument must be non-null. 否則，會擲回 null 引數例外狀況。Otherwise, a null argument exception is thrown. - 一般查詢轉譯例外狀況時擲回[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]套用無法轉譯為查詢的查詢執行。Normal query translation exceptions thrown during [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] query execution apply for a query that cannot be translated. - 會傳回第一個查詢命令。Only the first query command is returned. 具體來說，其他命令，用於積極式載入 () 則不包含在內。Specifically, additional commands that are used for eager loading () are not included. - 不會追蹤使用者沒有與命令。 does not track what the user does with the command. 比方說，傳回命令的執行結果不會受到追蹤並不會影響狀態。For example, results from the execution of the returned command are not tracked and do not affect state. ## Examples [!code-csharp[DLinqDebuggingSupport#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/cs/Program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[DLinqDebuggingSupport#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DLinqDebuggingSupport/vb/Module1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是弱型別的的版本。This is a weakly typed version of . 請務必有弱型別的的版本，因為它是相對常見的作法是以動態方式建構查詢。It is important to have a weakly typed version because it is a relatively common practice to construct queries dynamically. 是將強制應用程式使用反映來呼叫正確的泛型方法。It would be inconvenient to force the application to use reflection to call the correct generic method. 如果沒有特定型別的集合，會擲回例外狀況。If there is no collection for a particular type, an exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是用於查詢的主要進入點。This method is the main entry point for querying. 當強型別建立的新產生的屬性將封裝呼叫此方法。When a strongly typed is created, new generated properties encapsulate calls to this method. 例如，`Customers`產生傳回屬性`GetTable`。For example, a `Customers` property is generated that returns `GetTable`. 如果沒有特定型別的集合，會擲回例外狀況。If there is no collection for a particular type, an exception is thrown.

span.span: if the object tracking is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定為`false`改善擷取時間的效能，因為有較少的項目來追蹤。Setting this property to `false` improves performance at retrieval time, because there are fewer items to track. 擲回的例外狀況：An exception is thrown: - 如果屬性設定為`false`執行查詢之後。If the property is set to `false` after a query has been executed. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的有效模式 > 一節。For more information, see the Valid Modes section in . - 如果屬性設定為`false`和呼叫。If the property is set to `false` and is called. 如果是`false`，已忽略，並且視為`false`。If is `false`, is ignored and treated as `false`. 在此情況下，處於唯讀狀態。In this case, the is read-only. 如果是`true`，是`false`。If is `true`, is `false`. 在此情況下，可讓您使用載入物件圖形指示詞，但不會啟用延後的載入。In this case, allows you to load an object graph by using directives, but does not enable deferred loading.

summary.span: 使用資料庫中的資料來重新整理物件狀態。

span.span: Refreshes object state by using data in the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開放式並行存取錯誤，將項目帶入另一次嘗試的狀態後，此方法相當實用。This method is useful after an optimistic concurrency error to bring items into a state for another attempt. 它會更新的基本的欄位和屬性的物件上的狀態。It updates the state of the primitive fields and properties on the objects. > [!NOTE] > 如果物件位於*許多*一對多關聯性，物件上的外部索引鍵端將會設定和關聯性的另一端的物件指標會設定為新值。If an object is on the *many* side of a one-to-many relationship, the foreign key on the object will be set and the object pointer for the other side of the relationship will be set to the new value.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Refresh (System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode mode, System.Collections.IEnumerable entities);
.method public hidebysig instance void Refresh(valuetype System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode mode, class System.Collections.IEnumerable entities) cil managed
Public Sub Refresh (mode As RefreshMode, entities As IEnumerable)
public: void Refresh(System::Data::Linq::RefreshMode mode, System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ entities);

param.name: mode
param.span: 值，指定如何處理開放式並行存取 (Optimistic Concurrency) 衝突。

span.span: A value that specifies how optimistic concurrency conflicts are handled.

param.name: entities
param.span: 要重新整理的實體集合。

span.span: The collection of entities to be refreshed.

summary.span: 根據指定的模式重新整理實體物件集合。

span.span: Refreshes a collection of entity objects according to the specified mode.

param.name: entity
param.span: 要重新整理的物件。

span.span: The object to be refreshed.

summary.span: 根據指定的模式重新整理實體物件。

span.span: Refreshes an entity object according to the specified mode.

param.span: 要重新整理的實體物件陣列。

span.span: Refreshes an array of entity objects according to the specified mode.

summary.span: 計算要插入、更新或刪除的一組已修改的物件，並執行適當的命令來實作資料庫的變更。

span.span: Computes the set of modified objects to be inserted, updated, or deleted, and executes the appropriate commands to implement the changes to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果覆寫方法會有 insert、 update 或 delete執行這些方法，而不使用預設[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]命令。If override methods are present for insert, update, or delete, executes these methods instead of the default [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] commands. 開始交易，而且如果發生例外狀況將會回復時正在執行。 starts a transaction and will roll back if an exception occurs while is executing. 不過，這不會回復所做的變更在記憶體中或由追蹤; 這些變更將需要回復以手動方式。However, this does not roll back the changes in memory or tracked by the ; those changes will need to be rolled back manually. 您可以使用的新執行個體開始如果在記憶體中的變更會遭到捨棄。You can start with a new instance of the if the changes in memory are to be discarded.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SubmitChanges ();
.method public hidebysig instance void SubmitChanges() cil managed
Public Sub SubmitChanges ()
public: void SubmitChanges();

summary.span: 計算要插入、更新或刪除的一組已修改的物件，並執行適當的命令來實作資料庫的變更。

span.span: Computes the set of modified objects to be inserted, updated, or deleted, and executes the appropriate commands to implement the changes to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果覆寫方法會有 insert、 update 或 delete執行這些方法，而不使用預設[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]命令。If override methods are present for insert, update, or delete, executes these methods instead of the default [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] commands.

param.span: 有效引數如下：

summary.span: 傳送用來擷取物件至基礎資料庫中的變更，並指定送出失敗時所要採取的動作。

span.span: Sends changes that were made to retrieved objects to the underlying database, and specifies the action to be taken if the submission fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設失敗模式是。Default failure mode is . ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Data.Linq.ConflictModeEnumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.conflictmodeenumeration/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Data.Linq.ConflictModeEnumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.conflictmodeenumeration/vb/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.Common.DbTransaction Transaction { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Data.Common.DbTransaction Transaction
Public Property Transaction As DbTransaction
public: property System::Data::Common::DbTransaction ^ Transaction { System::Data::Common::DbTransaction ^ get(); void set(System::Data::Common::DbTransaction ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort] (~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 用來存取資料庫的本機交易。

span.span: Gets or sets a local transaction for the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] to use to access the database.

value.span: 執行查詢和命令時， 所使用的交易物件。

span.span: The transaction object used by the when executing queries and commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的主要案例是互通性與關聯式[!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)]程式碼。The primary scenario for this property is interoperability with relational [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] code. 例如，使用這個屬性，當您撰寫您自己`Create` / `Update` / `Delete`方法來設定`Transaction`屬性之 ADO`Command`物件。For example, use this property when you write your own `Create`/`Update`/`Delete` methods to set the `Transaction` property on the ADO `Command` object. 請注意下列事項：Note the following: - 如果未明確設定此屬性，則 getter 會傳回 null。If this property has not been explicitly set, the getter returns null. - 如果在執行程式碼內容中，設定這個屬性會擲回的例外狀況。If the code is executing in a context, setting this property throws an exception. - 如果這個屬性是設定和新已開啟，擲回例外狀況時執行的查詢或更新。If this property is set and a new is opened, an exception is thrown when a query or update is executed.

summary.span: 將現有的 轉換成物件。

span.span: Converts an existing to objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個資料列轉換中的物件。Each row in the is converted to an object in the . ``` public IEnumerable Translate(IDataReader reader) {} ``` 描述： 這個方法用來將轉換的現有物件。Description: This method is used to convert an existing to objects. 每個資料列轉換中的物件。Each row in the is converted to an object in the . **泛型參數：****Generic parameters:** `T`： 請參閱。`T`: See . **參數：****Parameters:** `Query`： 請參閱底下的命令的描述。`Query`: See the description for command under . `Parameters`： 請參閱底下的參數的描述。`Parameters`: See the description for parameters under . **傳回類型：****Return type:** ： 轉換所傳回的物件的集合。: collection of objects returned by the conversion.

param.name: elementType
param.span: 要傳回的 型別。

span.span: The type of the to be returned.

param.span: 結果中的資料行與物件中的欄位和屬性相符合的演算法用法如下：如果欄位或屬性已對應至特定資料行名稱，結果集 (Resultset) 必須包含該資料行名稱。

span.span: The algorithm for matching columns in the result to fields and properties in the object works as follows: If a field or property is mapped to a particular column name, that column name is expected in the resultset.

param.span: 如果欄位或屬性未對應，結果集必須包含與該欄位或屬性同名的資料行。

span.span: If a field or property is not mapped, a column with the same name as the field or property is expected in the resultset.

param.span: 尋找區分大小寫的相符項時會先進行比較。

span.span: The comparison is performed by looking for a case-sensitive match first.

param.span: 如果找不到這種相符項，就會繼續搜尋不區分大小寫的相符項。

span.span: If this match is not found, a subsequent search is occurs for a case-insensitive match.

param.span: 當下列所有條件皆為 true 時，查詢必須傳回該物件所有追蹤的欄位和屬性 (會延後載入的欄位和屬性除外)：T 是 明確追蹤的實體。

span.span: The query must return all the tracked fields and properties of the object (except those that are loaded on a deferred basis) when all the following conditions are true: T is an entity explicitly tracked by the .

param.span: 為 。

param.span: 這個實體具有主索引鍵。

span.span: The entity has a primary key.

param.span: 否則，會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Otherwise an exception is thrown.

param.span: 要轉換的 。
